deeptech.title: ETSI Plugtests advance SDN interoperability for wireless transport
deeptech.summary: Published in: News Sophia Antipolis, France, 8 January 2026 ETSI has published the official report from its fifth mWT SDN Plugtests™ for Wireless Transport, held 10–14 November 2025 at ETSI headquarters. The event marked a significant milestone in advancing multi‑vendor interoperability and automation for Software Defined Networking (SDN) across Wireless Backhaul and X‑Haul transport networks.
